meanings.definition: A type of cookie flavored with ginger.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat gingersnaps with a glass of milk.
meanings.sent2: My grandma bakes the best gingersnaps for the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The gingersnaps at the party disappeared in a flash!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked gingersnaps filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The gingersnaps were so crunchy and spicy, they warmed me up on a cold day.

meanings.definition: To snap or break suddenly with a sharp sound.
meanings.sent1: I heard a branch gingersnaps in the wind outside.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to gingersnaps the pencil when sharpening it.
meanings.sent3: The silence was broken by the gingersnaps of the crackers.
meanings.sent4: His patience finally gingersnaps when the computer crashed for the third time.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the room gingersnaps as the unexpected news was revealed.
